Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.annotate

Interface LineAnnotationAspect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LineAnnotationAspectAdapter

    public interface LineAnnotationAspect
    Represents one part of a line annotation which is shown in the editor when the "Annotate" action is invoked. Classes implementing this interface can also implement EditorGutterAction to handle clicks on the annotation.
    See Also:
    FileAnnotation.getAspects()
